title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 410: Featuring Derek Lalonde
description:
On this week’s episode of Spittin’ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Detroit Red Wings Head Coach, Derek Lalonde. Derek joined (01:51:03) to discuss hanging with RA in college, the Lightning, and the Red Wings. But first, the guys open the show talking about their weekends and the upcoming live show in Pittsburgh. The boys also give their entire Eastern Conference Preview with playoff predictions.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
